Scrivener's Purification.name: string/iota
Scrivener's Purification.description: Converts the iota on top of the stack into a string.

Wish Reflection.name: env_hand_lamp
Wish Reflection.description: Pushes whether a Hand Genie Lamp is being used to cast this pattern.

Inverse Sine Purification.name: arcsin
Inverse Sine Purification.description: Takes the inverse sine of a value with absolute value 1 or less, yielding the angle whose sine is that value. Related to the values of π and τ.

Zone Distillation: Item.name: zone_entity/item
Zone Distillation: Item.description: Take a position and maximum distance on the stack, and combine them into a list of dropped items near the position.

Greater Teleport.name: teleport/great
Greater Teleport.description: Far more powerful than Blink, this spell lets me teleport nearly anywhere in the entire world! There does seem to be a limit, but it is much greater than the normal radius of influence I am used to.

Zone Distillation: Player.name: zone_entity/player
Zone Distillation: Player.description: Take a position and maximum distance on the stack, and combine them into a list of players near the position.

Transformation Purification.name: matrix/make
Transformation Purification.description: Converts the iota on top of the stack into a matrix. This iota can be a number, vector, or list.

Rotation Distillation.name: matrix/rotation
Rotation Distillation.description: Accepts a vec v and number θ, and returns a matrix representing rotating by θ radians around v.

Akasha's Distillation.name: akashic/read
Akasha's Distillation.description: Read the iota associated with the given pattern out of the Akashic Library with its Record at the given position. This has no range limit. Costs about one Amethyst Dust.

Use Item On.name: mote/use_on
Use Item On.description: Accepts a mote, and either an entity, or a target block and a normal vector. Uses the item on the entity/block. The mote must either only have one item in it, or the items contained must be extremely simple (no NBT data).

Split Vision.name: shader_spider
Split Vision.description: Splits my vision into multiple sections, similar to what a spider might see. I am unsure whether it actually grants me more vision...

Hallucinate Pling.name: pling
Hallucinate Pling.description: Causes me to hear a pling that is inaudible to other players.

Disqueue.name: killall
Disqueue.description: Terminates all cassettes, similar to the effects of the Parallel Processing mishap.

Promote Lamp.name: promote_lamp
Promote Lamp.description: If just a sliver of a mind is capable of such power, how about the whole body? Hold the lamp in my other hand and cast. Costs about ten Charged Amethyst.

Soulprint Reflection.name: getsoulprint
Soulprint Reflection.description: Returns my soulprint, mishapping if cast using anything other than a staff. Costs a negligible amount of media.

Greater Blink.name: greater_blink
Greater Blink.description: Teleports me up to 128 blocks away, relative to my position and rotation. Costs about two Amethyst Dust.

Create Lava.name: create_lava
Create Lava.description: Summon a block of lava (or insert up to a bucket's worth) into a block at the given position. Costs about one Charged Amethyst.

Minimus Distillation.name: less
Minimus Distillation.description: If the first argument is less than the second, return True. Otherwise, return False.

Zone Distillation: Non-Animal.name: zone_entity/not_animal
Zone Distillation: Non-Animal.description: Take a position and maximum distance on the stack, and combine them into a list of non-animal entities near the position.

Selection Distillation.name: index
Selection Distillation.description: Remove the number at the top of the stack, then replace the list at the top with the nth element of that list (where n is the number you removed). Replaces the list with Null if the number is out of bounds.

Internalize Pigment.name: colorize
Internalize Pigment.description: I must be holding a Pigment in my other hand to cast this spell. When I do, it will consume the dye and permanently change my mind's coloration (at least, until I cast the spell again). Costs about one Amethyst Dust.

Erase Grimoire.name: erase_grimoire
Erase Grimoire.description: Erases any associations for a pattern that may exist in the Grimoire in my offhand.

Naval Distillation.name: fluid_raycast
Naval Distillation.description: Works similar to Archer's Distillation but targets only liquids, piercing through all other blocks.

Multiplicative Distillation.name: mul
Multiplicative Distillation.args:
Mathematics: num|vec, num|vec → num|vec  
Complexities: complex, num → complex  
Quaternionics: quaternion, num → quaternion  
Matrices: mat, mat → mat
Multiplicative Distillation.description:
Mathematics: Perform multiplication or the dot product.

Complexities: Performs Multiplication

Quaternionics: Performs Multiplication, Scalar if a num & quat are given, Hamiltonian if 2 quaternions are given.

Matrices: Multiplies the first n by m by with an m by p matrix to get an n by p matrix.

Running Sum Purification.name: running/sum
Running Sum Purification.description: Takes a list from the stack and computes its running sum, for example inputting [1,2,5] would return [1,3,8].

Single's Purification.name: singleton
Single's Purification.description: Remove the top of the stack, then push a list containing only that element.

Maximus Distillation.name: greater
Maximus Distillation.description: If the first argument is greater than the second, return True. Otherwise, return False.

Fisherman's Gambit II.name: fisherman/copy
Fisherman's Gambit II.description: Like Fisherman's Gambit, but instead of moving the iota, copies it.

Reveal.name: print
Reveal.description: Displays the top iota of the stack to me.

Metadata Purification.name: readideatime
Metadata Purification.description: Accepts a valid key, and returns when the corresponding iota was inscribed, or -1. Costs no media.

Conductor's Reflection.name: queryrod
Conductor's Reflection.description: Returns a boolean corresponding to whether the current cast is making use of a rod.

Luminance Purification.name: get_light
Luminance Purification.description: Pushes the light level at the position as a number 0 to 15. If inside a nontransparent block, it returns zero.

Modulus Distillation.name: modulo
Modulus Distillation.description: Takes the modulus of two numbers. This is the amount remaining after division - for example, 5 %% 2 is 1, and 5 %% 3 is 2. When applied on vectors, performs the above operation elementwise.

Rotation Gambit.name: rotate
Rotation Gambit.args: any, any, any → any, any, any
Rotation Gambit.description: Yanks the iota third from the top of the stack to the top. [0, 1, 2] becomes [1, 2, 0].

White Sun's Nadir.name: potion/weakness
White Sun's Nadir.description: Inflicts weakness. Base cost is one Amethyst Dust per 10 seconds.

Entity Purification: Monster.name: get_entity/monster
Entity Purification: Monster.description: Transform the position on the stack into the monster at that location (or Null if there isn't one).

Mind's Reflection.name: get_caster
Mind's Reflection.description: Adds me, the caster, to the stack.

Blank Reflection.name: string/empty
Blank Reflection.description: Add an empty string to the stack, useful for combining with other strings.

Derivation Decomposition.name: unappend
Derivation Decomposition.description: Remove the iota on the end of the list at the top of the stack, and add it to the top of the stack.

Conjure Spike.name: spike
Conjure Spike.description: Takes a non-air position, an axis vector, and a delay in seconds up to ten seconds long and conjures a spike at that location. Costs about one Amethyst Shard.

Black Sun's Zenith.name: potion/absorption
Black Sun's Zenith.description: Bestows absorption. Base cost is one Amethyst Dust per second.

Power Distillation II.name: altpow
Power Distillation II.description: Raises the first n by m matrix elementwise to the power of another n by m matrix.

Turret Reflection.name: env_turret
Turret Reflection.description: Pushes whether an Archgenie Lamp on a Pedestal is being used to cast this pattern.

Containment Distillation.name: mote/storage/contains
Containment Distillation.description: Returns true if the Mote Nexus at the given position contains a mote of the given type, or that would stack with the given mote, and false otherwise.

Anchorite's Flight.name: flight/range
Anchorite's Flight.description: A flight limited in its range.

Modify Block: Ephemeral.name: modify_block_ephemeral
Modify Block: Ephemeral.description: This modifier takes in a number in addition to a position and shatters the block after many twentieths of a second. Subsequent casts can lengthen or shorten the duration.

Vision Purification.name: translate_dye
Vision Purification.description: Translates a dye color into a vector, where each component is from 0 to 1 and represents the red, green, and blueness of the dye respectively.

Listen.name: wisp/trigger/comm
Listen.description: The wisp's next cast will not occur until it has received at least one communication.

Greater Fold Reflection.name: circle/bounds/max
Greater Fold Reflection.description: Returns the position of the upper-south-east corner of the bounds of this spell circle.

Sorter's Reflection.name: type/item_held
Sorter's Reflection.description: Adds the type of the item in the caster's offhand to the stack if there is one present, or the type of the casting hand otherwise.

Conjure Tchotchke.name: conjure_tchotchke
Conjure Tchotchke.description: Conjures a Tchotchke at the location with the amount of media, rank, and Hex. Costs about one Charged Amethyst and the media used for the battery.

Green Sun's Nadir.name: potion/slowness
Green Sun's Nadir.description: Inflicts slowness. Base cost is one Amethyst Dust per 5 seconds.

Rotate BIT.name: rotatebit
Rotate BIT.description:
Rotates the BIT by the given Quaternion.
(Does not compound with multiple uses!)
Costs about one Amethyst Dust.

Grand Wish Reflection.name: env_arch_lamp
Grand Wish Reflection.description: Pushes whether an Archgenie Lamp is being used to cast this pattern.

Ignite.name: ignite
Ignite.description: Start a fire on top of the given location, as if a Fire Charge was applied, or sets fire to a creature. Costs about one Amethyst Dust.

Glowing Purification.name: blockstate_glow
Glowing Purification.description: Pushes a boolean for whether the block is in a "lit" state, for example furnaces, Redstone torches, lamps, and campfires.

Inequality Distillation.name: not_equals
Inequality Distillation.description: If the first argument does not equal the second (outside a small tolerance), return True. Otherwise, return False.

Rotate Speck.name: rotate_specklike
Rotate Speck.description: Rotates a speck entity to face the vector.

Akasha's Gambit.name: akashic/write
Akasha's Gambit.description: Associate the iota with the given pattern in the Akashic Library with its Record at the given position. This does have a range limit. Costs about one Amethyst Dust.

Stadiometer's Purification.name: get_entity_height
Stadiometer's Purification.description: Transforms an entity on the stack into its height.

Brigh's Gambit.name: everbook/toggle_macro
Brigh's Gambit.description: Takes a pattern and marks that entry of your Everbook as a Pattern that when drawn by your hand will be treated as any other of Nature's patterns.

Genie Gambit.name: set_hand_lamp_storage
Genie Gambit.description: Asks the genie to remember an iota for me. Strangely, the genie seems able to bypass the Transgress Others mishap, perhaps because it requires my active concentration to use this lamp.

Banish Sentinel.name: sentinel/destroy
Banish Sentinel.description: Banish my sentinel, and remove it from the world. Costs a negligible amount of media.

Entropy Reflection II.name: gaussianrand
Entropy Reflection II.description: Returns a random number between 0 and 1, with a gaussian distribution.

Circadian Reflection.name: get_day
Circadian Reflection.description: Pushes the progress of the day as a number between 0 (start) and 1 (end) of the day.

Athena's Gambit.name: athena
Athena's Gambit.description: Like Hermes' Gambit but mishaps simply stop the execution and continue the Hex without incurring the effects of the mishap. Pushes whether it mishapped.

Phonebook Purification.name: link/get
Phonebook Purification.description: Removes an index from the stack, and adds the entity connected to the link at that index to the stack.

Gasp.name: gasp
Gasp.description: Instantly replenishes a creature's air bubbles. Costs about one Amethyst Dust.

Undertaker's Gambit.name: tuck
Undertaker's Gambit.description: Copy the top iota of the stack, then put it under the second iota. [0, 1] becomes [1, 0, 1].

Overgrow.name: bonemeal
Overgrow.description: Encourage a plant or sapling at the target position to grow, as if Bonemeal was applied. Costs a bit more than one Amethyst Dust.

Craft Debugger.name: craft/debugger
Craft Debugger.description: Creates a Debugger that casts a Hex, similar to certain other patterns I've used in the past.Costs about ten Charged Amethyst.

Locator's Distillation.name: index_of
Locator's Distillation.args:
List Manipulation: list, any → num  
Blackboxes: blackbox, any → boolean  
Strings: str, str → num
Locator's Distillation.description:
List Manipulation: Remove the iota at the top of the stack, then replace the list at the top with the first index of that iota within the list (starting from 0). Replaces the list with -1 if the iota doesn't exist in the list.

Blackboxes: Tests the Blackbox for the existence of an iota. Pushes a simple true or false.

Strings: Removes two strings from the top of the stack, and returns the first index of the first string where the second string is a substring.

Duelist's Purification.name: item/main_hand
Duelist's Purification.description: Transforms the entity at the top of the stack into the Item Stack in its main hand. Also works on Item Frames and dropped items.

Modify Block: Volatile.name: modify_block_volatile
Modify Block: Volatile.description: This modifier makes the block break other mage blocks it's touching. Notably, if it breaks another volatile block, that block breaks and so on until every volatile block shatters.

Congruence Distillation.name: congruent
Congruence Distillation.description: Pushes whether two patterns have the same shape and orientation.

Regress Gambit.name: page/left
Regress Gambit.description: Turns the spellbook that your are holding one page to the left

Dioscuri Gambit II.name: dup_many
Dioscuri Gambit II.description: Takes a number and duplicates that many elements of the stack while preserving order.

Instant Aegis.name: magearmor
Instant Aegis.description: Accepts a player to grant the armor to, the durability of the armor, the protection value of the armor (max 10), a status effect to apply, and that effect's level. The latter two can be replaced with any non-status iota to ignore them.

Archgenie Gambit.name: set_arch_lamp_storage
Archgenie Gambit.description: Can be cast by a casting device, Staff, or within the arch lamp to remember an iota. Unlike hand lamps, this is subject to Transgress Others mishap.

Genie Reflection: Rotational.name: get_hand_lamp_rotation
Genie Reflection: Rotational.description: Pushes my original rotation when I began using the lamp.

Zone Exaltation: Not-Status.name: getbystatusinverse
Zone Exaltation: Not-Status.description: Accepts a status effect type, a vector, and a number (n), and returns a list of entities within radius n of the vector which do not have that effect.

Manager's Purification.name: wisp/hex
Manager's Purification.description: Removes a reference to a wisp from the stack, and replaces it with the wisp's contained hex. Must be a wisp you summoned, or a wisp that has allowed transfer with the caster or caster's owner.

Postage Purification.name: getrevealcost
Postage Purification.description: Accepts a player and returns how much amethyst dust it would cost to send them a message via Postman's Gambit, between 1/10 of a dust and 10 dust.

Wave Reflection.name: wave
Wave Reflection.description: Returns the posistion of the Wave of media passing through a Spell Circle

Entity Purification: BIT.name: get_entity/bit
Entity Purification: BIT.description: Transform the position on the stack into the BIT at that location (or Null if there isn't one)

Williams' Reflection.name: readrodram
Williams' Reflection.description: Returns the iota stored in the current cast loop. Defaults to NULL.

Lesser Fold Reflection.name: circle/bounds/min
Lesser Fold Reflection.description: Returns the position of the lower-north-west corner of the bounds of this spell circle.

Stealthy Reflection.name: sneaking
Stealthy Reflection.description: Pushes how many twentieths of a second I've been intending to , or -1 if I am not.

Visualize Forms.name: shader_lines
Visualize Forms.description: Transforms the world into a thin outline of black and white. Possibly useful for identifying subtle contrasts.

Floor Purification.name: floor
Floor Purification.description: "Floors" a number, cutting off the fractional component and leaving an integer value. If passed a vector, instead floors each of its components.

Debug Locator's Reflection.name: next_eval_index
Debug Locator's Reflection.description: Adds the index of the next iota to be evaluated if executed by a Debugger or Evaluator, or Null otherwise.

Encore.name: resetrod
Encore.description: Accepts a positive integer. Halts the current cast loop but also reduces the cooldown period from 1 second to ((1/20) * number) seconds. Cooldown due to mishap is unaffected.

Lunar Reflection.name: get_moon
Lunar Reflection.description: Pushes the current phase of the moon as a fraction of its size.

Modify Block: Energized.name: modify_block_energized
Modify Block: Energized.description: This modifier makes the block emit a Redstone signal, with the number corresponding to the power level of the output.

Blink.name: blink
Blink.description:
Remove an entity and length from the stack, then teleport the given entity along its look vector by the given length.
Costs about one Amethyst Shard per two blocks travelled.

Allow Transfer Others.name: wisp/transfer/others/allow
Allow Transfer Others.description: This takes a wisp that you own and an index, and allows the wisp to exchange media with the linkable at that index.

Heket's Gambit.name: while
Heket's Gambit.description: Removes a pattern list from the stack. Examines (but does not remove) the iota beneath it, and evaluates the pattern list if and only if Augur's Purification would respond to that iota with True. Examination and evaluation repeats until the iota would no longer create truth.

Place Block II.name: place_type
Place Block II.description: Accepts an item type or mote and a location, and attempts to place a block of that item type at that location. If a mote was passed it will instead place from the record referenced by that mote. Costs an eighth of an Amethyst Dust.

Assessor's Purification.name: writable/entity
Assessor's Purification.description: Like Assessor's Reflection, but the writability of an entity is checked instead of my other hand.

Conjure Mage Block.name: conjure_mage_block
Conjure Mage Block.description: Conjures a mage block at the location. Costs about three Amethyst Dust.I can create a city out of nothing, or I can cover it in volcanic rock.

Running Product Purification.name: running/mul
Running Product Purification.description: Takes a list from the stack and computes its running product, for example inputting [1,2,5] would return [1,2,10].

Particles.name: particles
Particles.description: Accepts a location or a list of locations, and either creates a particle at the location, or creates lines of particles between the locations in the list. Costs two thousandths of an Amethyst Dust per location.

Discern Shroud.name: detectshroud
Discern Shroud.description: Accepts a vector and a number, and returns a list of unit vectors pointing from the initial vector to shrouded entities within a radius defined by the number.

Send Iota.name: link/comm/send
Send Iota.description: Removes an iota from the stack, then removes an index from the stack and sends the iota along the link at the given index.  This costs one hundredth of an Amethyst Dust.

Bind Storage - Temporary.name: mote/storage/bind/temp
Bind Storage - Temporary.description: Target a Mote Nexus block in the world and bind to it for the remainder of this cast, temporarily overriding your primary binding. Costs one thousandth of an Amethyst Dust.

Depot Gambit.name: mote/storage/set
Depot Gambit.description: Move the record referenced by the passed mote to the Mote Nexus at the passed position. This returns a new mote pointing to that record, and invalidates all previous motes pointing to that record.

Program Purification II.name: foretell
Program Purification II.description: Pushes null if I do not have an active cassette with that label, or how many twentieths of a second until that cassette fires if I do.

Homeland Reflection.name: getdim/overworld
Homeland Reflection.description: Returns a Spatial Imprint representing the overworld. Costs one-tenth of an amethyst dust.

Breaking Reflection.name: string/newline
Breaking Reflection.description: Add a string to the stack representing a break between lines, useful for combining with other strings.

Librarian's Purification II.name: read_shelf
Librarian's Purification II.description: Reads the iota from an akashic bookshelf.

Zone Exaltation: Type.name: zone_entity/type
Zone Exaltation: Type.description: Remove an entity type, a position, and a radius from the stack, and returns a list of all entities of that type within that radius of that position.

Selection Exaltation.name: slice
Selection Exaltation.args:
List Manipulation: list, num, num → list  
Strings: str, num, num → str
Selection Exaltation.description:
List Manipulation: Remove the two numbers at the top of the stack, then take a sublist of the list at the top of the stack between those indices, lower bound inclusive, upper bound exclusive. For example, the 0, 2 sublist of [0, 1, 2, 3, 4] would be [0, 1].

Strings: Removes a string and two positive integers from the top of the stack, and returns the substring from the first to the second (inclusive first, exclusive second).

Chirographer's Purification.name: serialize_pattern
Chirographer's Purification.description: Turns a pattern into a list of numbers for my splitting, analysis, and dissection.

Compass' Purification II.name: entity_pos/foot
Compass' Purification II.description: Transforms an entity on the stack into the position it is standing. I should probably use this on other entities.

Constructed Reflection.name: env_circle
Constructed Reflection.description: Pushes whether some form of grand work is being used to cast this pattern.

Destroy Liquid.name: destroy_water
Destroy Liquid.description: Drains either a liquid container at, or a body of liquid around, the given position. Costs about two Charged Amethyst.

Conjugation Prfn..name: conjugate
Conjugation Prfn..description: Negates the imaginary coefficient of the topmost iota

Zero Distillation.name: matrix/zero
Zero Distillation.description: Accepts positive integers n and m, and returns an n by m matrix of zeros.

Sifter's Gambit.name: string/chat/prefix/set
Sifter's Gambit.description: Accepts a string; All future chat messages starting with that string won't be seen by others, and only messages prefixed with that string can be read by Whisper Reflection.

Flesh Purification.name: is_meat
Flesh Purification.description: Takes in an item identifier and pushes whether it's considered a meat, meaning wolves can eat it.

Pocket Reflection.name: wristpocket_item
Pocket Reflection.description: Returns the identifier of the item in my wristpocket, or Null if it is empty.

Summon Projectile Wisp.name: wisp/summon/projectile
Summon Projectile Wisp.description: This wisp is summoned and launched like an arrow, casting its hex on whatever it hits. The initial stack when it executes will be a reference to itself, then a reference to what it hit.

Dispel Rain.name: dispel_rain
Dispel Rain.description: A counterpart to summoning rain. This spell will dispel rain across the world I cast it upon. Costs about one Amethyst Shard. Does nothing if the skies are already clear.

Leaping Reflection.name: jumping
Leaping Reflection.description: Pushes how many twentieths of a second I've been intending to , or -1 if I am not.

Entity Purification: Animal.name: get_entity/animal
Entity Purification: Animal.description: Transform the position on the stack into the animal at that location (or Null if there isn't one).

Negation Purification.name: not
Negation Purification.args:
Logical Operators: bool → bool  
Sets: num → num
Negation Purification.description:
Logical Operators: If the argument is True, return False; if it is False, return True.

Sets: Takes the inversion of a bitset, changing all "on" bits to "off" and vice versa. In my experience, this will take the form of that number negated and decreased by one. For example, 0 will become -1, and -100 will become 99.

Signature Purification.name: checksignature
Signature Purification.description: Accepts a soulprint, and checks if the item in my other hand is engraved with it. Returns true if so, false otherwise. Costs a negligible amount of media.

Name.name: string/name/set
Name.description: Takes a string and an entity, and sets that entities name to the given string. If the entity is an item entity, also set the item's name. Costs a hundredth of an Amethyst Dust.

Collector's Distillation.name: item/inventory/items
Collector's Distillation.description: Removes two vectors from the stack representing position and side. Returns a list of Items in the block at the given position accessible from the given side (or all if second vector is zero).

Resize Speck.name: size_specklike
Resize Speck.description: Scales the speck, can range from 0 to 10. Represents size in blocks and is zero by default.

Auditor's Purification.name: readable/entity
Auditor's Purification.description: Like Auditor's Reflection, but the readability of an entity is checked instead of my other hand.

Tangent Purification.name: tan
Tangent Purification.description: Takes the tangent of an angle in radians, yielding the slope of that angle drawn on a circle. Related to the values of π and τ.

Entity Distillation: Type.name: get_entity/type
Entity Distillation: Type.description: Remove an entity type and a position from the stack, and returns an entity of that type at that position if one exists.

Reflecting Gambit.name: swap_one_three
Reflecting Gambit.args: any, any, any → any, any, any
Reflecting Gambit.description: Reflects the order of the top three iota, turning A, B, C into C, B, A. Essentially swaps the top and the third-from-the-top iota.

Flock's Reflection.name: stack_len
Flock's Reflection.description: Pushes the size of the stack as a number to the top of the stack. (For example, a stack of [0, 1] will become [0, 1, 2].)

Schr\u00f6dinger's Reflection.name: create_property
Schr\u00f6dinger's Reflection.description: Pushes a reference to a random property. Costs one charged amethyst to burn this property into the universe.

Allegiance Distillation.name: wisp/owner
Allegiance Distillation.description: Removes a reference to a wisp and an entity from the stack, and returns true if that entity owns that wisp, and false otherwise.

Disallow Transfer.name: wisp/transfer/disallow
Disallow Transfer.description: Correspondingly, this takes an index and disallows the wisp from exchanging media with the linkable at that index.

Genie Reflection: Media.name: get_hand_lamp_media
Genie Reflection: Media.description: Pushes the remaining media of the lamp, in units of dust.

Age Scroll.name: age_scroll
Age Scroll.description: Yellows the parchment of an Animated Scroll, making it bear striking semblance to some ancient scrolls I've been finding.

Craft Phial.name: craft/battery
Craft Phial.description: Infuse a bottle with media to form a Phial.

Craft Bottomless Trinket.name: craftbottomlesstrinket
Craft Bottomless Trinket.description: Writes a hex to the bottomless trinket in my other hand. Costs ten charged amethyst.

Timekeeper's Reflection.name: current_tick
Timekeeper's Reflection.description: Adds a number to the stack which seems to be related to how Nature represents time; If I cast the pattern, then cast the same pattern a second later, the number it adds has increased by 20.

Themis' Gambit.name: themis
Themis' Gambit.description: Takes a list and a pattern or pattern list which is used to sort the list by casting over every iota similar to Thoth's Gambit.

Perlin Distillation.name: perlin
Perlin Distillation.description: Measures the concentration of ambient at that point in space and time, normalized between 0 and 1.

Debugger's Reflection.name: const/debugging
Debugger's Reflection.description: Adds True to the top of the stack if executed by a Debugger or Evaluator, or False otherwise.

Euler's Reflection.name: const/double/e
Euler's Reflection.description: Adds e, the base of natural logarithms, to the stack.

Fireball.name: explode/fire
Fireball.description: Remove a number and vector from the stack, then create a fiery explosion at the given location with the given power.

Distortion Reflection.name: get_einstein
Distortion Reflection.description: Pushes whether this dimension is bounded by standard rules of space and time: compasses and clocks will work here.

Zone Distillation: Monster.name: zone_entity/monster
Zone Distillation: Monster.description: Take a position and maximum distance on the stack, and combine them into a list of monsters near the position.

Media Purification.name: get_media
Media Purification.description: Pushes the amount of media inside an item, that a creature contains or holds, or that a specialized media-holding block contains.

Accessory Purification.name: get_offhand_stack
Accessory Purification.description: Returns the type of item in my offhand.

Evocation Reflection.name: env_evocation
Evocation Reflection.description: Pushes whether pure mental effort is being used to cast this pattern.

Construct.name: place_block_type
Construct.description: Places a specific type of block from my inventory at a position, orientation, and horizontal orientation. Costs about one-fourth of one Amethyst Dust.

Postmaster's Reflection.name: link/comm/num
Postmaster's Reflection.description: Adds to the stack the number of unread iota in the caster's received iota queue.

Restoration Purification II.name: matrix/unmake/direct
Restoration Purification II.description: As Restoration Purification, except it always returns a list of lists of numbers.

Hashing Purification.name: hash
Hashing Purification.description: Accepts any iota, and converts it into its hashed form.

Trade.name: mote/trade
Trade.description: Accepts a villager, a list of motes to trade with to villager, and optionally an int for which of that villager's trades to attempt. (int? above means that you can pass 2 or 3 arguments, the optional 3rd being an int).

Recognizer's Purification.name: recognize
Recognizer's Purification.description: Pushes extra identifier information of an entity, mainly the item type of an item entity or the item type inside an item frame entity.

Gemini Gambit.name: duplicate_n
Gemini Gambit.description: Removes the number at the top of the stack, then copies the top iota of the stack that number of times. (A count of 2 results in two of the iota on the stack, not three.)

Surgeon's Exaltation.name: replace
Surgeon's Exaltation.description: Remove the top iota of the stack and the number at the top, then set the nth element of the list at the top of the stack to that iota (where n is the number you removed). Does nothing if the number is out of bounds.

Excisor's Distillation.name: remove_from
Excisor's Distillation.args:
List Manipulation: list, num → list  
Blackboxes: blackbox, any → blackbox
Excisor's Distillation.description:
List Manipulation: Remove the number at the top of the stack, then remove the nth element of the list at the top of the stack (where n is the number you removed).

Blackboxes: Removes an iota from the Blackbox if it is there. Does not mishap if it's not.

Quaternionic Inverse.name: qinvert
Quaternionic Inverse.description: Negates the coefficients of i, j, & k

Vanish Scroll.name: vanish_scroll
Vanish Scroll.description: Causes the Animated Scroll to become invisible leaving only the pattern, making it appear as though the pattern were magically etched into the surface the scroll is on.

Axial Purification.name: coerce_axial
Axial Purification.description: For a vector, coerce it to its nearest axial direction, a unit vector. For a number, return the sign of the number; 1 if positive, -1 if negative. In both cases, zero is unaffected.

Metadata Distillation.name: readideawriter
Metadata Distillation.description: Accepts a valid key and a player, and returns whether the corresponding iota was inscribed by that player. Costs no media.

Hoarder's Distillation.name: item/inventory/stacks
Hoarder's Distillation.description: Removes two vectors from the stack representing position and side. Returns a list of Item Stacks in the block at the given position accessible from the given side (or all if second vector is zero).

Mage Hand.name: mage_hand
Mage Hand.description: Projects my mind's hand forward to use my wristpocketed item and interact with the world. If my wristpocket is empty, acts as though a plain hand had reached out. Costs about one Amethyst Dust.

Set Breakpoint After.name: breakpoint/after
Set Breakpoint After.description: Pauses the Debugger after executing this pattern (ie. before executing the next pattern).

Power Distillation.name: pow
Power Distillation.args:
Mathematics: num|vec, num|vec → num|vec  
Complexities: num, complex → complex  
Matrices: mat, int → mat
Power Distillation.description:
Mathematics: Perform exponentiation or vector projection.

Complexities: Performs Exponentiation.

Matrices: Accepts a square matrix and an integer, and raises the matrix to the power of the integer.

Threading Reflection.name: specs
Threading Reflection.description: Pushes the total number of cassettes slots that I currently have.

Stocktake Purification.name: mote/contained/get
Stocktake Purification.description: Gets all the mote records from the currently bound Mote Nexus that match the passed item type or could be combined with the passed mote.

Detective's Purification.name: identify
Detective's Purification.description: Pushes the identifier of an entity or block at a vector.

Delay Wisp.name: wisp/trigger/tick
Delay Wisp.description: Removes an integer from the stack, then delays the wisp's next cast until at least that many twentieth's of a second have passed. This and other triggers like it will halve the wisp's upkeep cost while it isn't casting.

Gate's Closing.name: gate/close
Gate's Closing.description: Consumes a non-drifing gate iota, or a drifting gate iota and a position. Transports all the entities marked with the passed gate to the stored or given position, as relevant. Costs half an Amethyst Shard, plus an Amethyst Dust per metre transported per entity, if the gate was drifting.

Open Transmit.name: link/comm/open_transmit
Open Transmit.description: Similar to Introspection, until drawing a Close Transmit all patterns I draw are sent along the link whose index is at the top of the stack.

Noetic Gateway.name: dimteleport
Noetic Gateway.description:
Accepts an entity and a Spatial Imprint and teleports the entity to its position in the proper dimension. Generally costs 20 Charged Amethyst.
Will fail if supplied a player other than myself.

Summon Lightning.name: lightning
Summon Lightning.description: I command the heavens! This spell will summon a bolt of lightning to strike the earth where I direct it. Costs about three Amethyst Shards.

Epiphany Purification.name: am_enlightened
Epiphany Purification.description: Pushes whether the given player has achieved enlightenment like I have.

Haste.name: wisp/move/speed/set
Haste.description: Removes a number from the stack, and sets the executing Cyclic Wisp's maximum speed to that number.

Genie Reflection: Temporal.name: get_hand_lamp_use_time
Genie Reflection: Temporal.description: Pushes how many times the lamp has cast since I began using the lamp. I can divide by by 20 to convert to seconds.

Black Sun's Nadir.name: potion/wither
Black Sun's Nadir.description: Inflicts withering. Base cost is one Amethyst Dust per second.

Edify Sapling.name: edify
Edify Sapling.description: Forcibly infuse media into the sapling at the target position, causing it to grow into an Edified Tree. Costs about one Charged Amethyst.

Bubbling Gambit.name: swap_two_three
Bubbling Gambit.args: any, any, any → any, any, any
Bubbling Gambit.description: Causes the third-from-the-top iota to bubble up over the second-from-the-top iota, essentially swapping them.

Garbage Reflection.name: garbage
Garbage Reflection.description: Pushes Garbage to my stack. I am unsure why I would ever want this pattern but it exists.

Pathfinder's Reflection.name: wisp/move/target/get
Pathfinder's Reflection.description: Adds to the stack the position vector that the executing Cyclic Wisp is currently moving towards.

Lodestone Reflection.name: circle/impetus_dir
Lodestone Reflection.description: Returns the direction the Impetus of this spell circle is facing as a unit vector.

Speedometer's Reflection.name: wisp/move/speed/get
Speedometer's Reflection.description: Gets the executing Cyclic Wisp's current maximum speed.

Shout Thought.name: shout_telepathy
Shout Thought.description: Grandly flahes an iota across my vision. It obstructs my vision and takes some time to fade in, so I shall only use it sparingly.

Entity Purification: Wisp.name: get_entity/wisp
Entity Purification: Wisp.description: Transform the position on the stack into the wisp at that location (or Null if there isn't one).

Axis Angle Distillation.name: axisangle
Axis Angle Distillation.description: Pushes a quaternion that reperesents a rotation by the given angle num radias around the given vector.

Listener's Reflection.name: string/chat/all
Listener's Reflection.description: Adds the last message anyone sent to the stack as a string.

Apothecary's Purification II.name: getstatuscategory
Apothecary's Purification II.description: Accepts a status effect type, and returns a number based on whether the effect is likely to be helpful, harmful, or neutral to a creature.

Hallucinate Click.name: click
Hallucinate Click.description: Causes me to hear a click that is inaudible to other players.

Extinguish Area.name: extinguish
Extinguish Area.description: Extinguish blocks in a large area. Costs about six Amethyst Dust.

Zone Distillation: Non-Player.name: zone_entity/not_player
Zone Distillation: Non-Player.description: Take a position and maximum distance on the stack, and combine them into a list of non-player characters near the position.

Maximus Distillation II.name: greater_eq
Maximus Distillation II.description: If the first argument is greater than or equal to the second, return True. Otherwise, return False.

Sleight.name: sleight
Sleight.description: Performs an act of magical sleight of hand to steal items into my wristpocket or expel my wristpocket back into the world. Costs about a fourth of one Amethyst Dust.

Ma'at's Gambit.name: maat
Ma'at's Gambit.description: Takes a boolean and any iota. If the boolean is false, mishaps and prints the iota.

Toppling Gambit.name: matrix/split/vert
Toppling Gambit.description: Accepts an n by m matrix and an int from 0 to n, and returns two matrices created by splitting the input matrix vertically at the inputted int.

Ambit Purification.name: env_ambit
Ambit Purification.description: Pushes whether a location or entity is in ambit.

Capacity Reflection.name: mote/storage/remaining_capacity/get
Capacity Reflection.description: Gets the remaining capacity of the bound Mote Nexus.

Splitting Gambit.name: mote/split
Splitting Gambit.description: Splits the specified number of items off of the passed mote, creating a new mote pointing to a new mote record.

Shieldbearer's Purification.name: item/off_hand
Shieldbearer's Purification.description: Transforms the entity at the top of the stack into the Item Stack in its off hand.

Archgenie Reflection: Rotational.name: get_arch_lamp_rotation
Archgenie Reflection: Rotational.description: Pushes my original rotation when the arch lamp started casting.

Make Note.name: beep
Make Note.description: Remove a vector and two numbers from the stack. Plays an instrument defined by the first number at the given location, with a note defined by the second number. Costs a negligible amount of media.

Alidade's Purification.name: get_entity_look
Alidade's Purification.description: Transforms an entity on the stack into the direction it's looking in, as a unit vector.

Gate's Opening.name: gate/mark
Gate's Opening.description: Consumes a gate iota and an entity. Marks that entity to be teleported the next time that gate is closed. Costs one twentieth of an Amethyst Dust.

Blue Sun's Nadir.name: potion/levitation
Blue Sun's Nadir.description: Inflicts levitation. Base cost is one Amethyst Dust per 5 seconds.

Exclusion Distillation.name: xor
Exclusion Distillation.args:
Logical Operators: bool, bool → bool  
Blackboxes: blackbox, blackbox → blackbox  
Sets: (num, num)|(list, list) → num|list
Exclusion Distillation.description:
Logical Operators: Returns True if exactly one of the arguments is true; otherwise returns False.

Blackboxes: Produces a Blackbox with iotas that are in one but not both Blackboxes.

Sets: Takes the exclusive disjunction of two sets.

Wristpocket.name: wristpocket
Wristpocket.description: This spell vanishes the stack of items in my other hand, or conjures it back, swapping if my other hand is holding something. Costs about a eighth of one Amethyst Dust.

Set Breakpoint Before.name: breakpoint/before
Set Breakpoint Before.description: Pauses the Debugger before executing this pattern.

Summon Rain.name: summon_rain
Summon Rain.description: I control the clouds! This spell will summon rain across the world I cast it upon. Costs about one Charged Amethyst. Does nothing if it is already raining.

Gemini Decomposition.name: duplicate
Gemini Decomposition.description: Duplicates the top iota of the stack.

Stocktake Reflection.name: mote/contained_type/get
Stocktake Reflection.description: Gets all the types of motes contained in the currently bound Mote Nexus.

Mnemosyne's Gambit.name: everbook/read
Mnemosyne's Gambit.description: Takes the position of an Akashic Record, as well as a Pattern as a key, and retrieves the iota at that key from your Everbook, storing it in the given Akashic Record if able.

Tchotchke Reflection.name: read_tchotchke
Tchotchke Reflection.description: Pushes the iota from the Tchotchke's inner iota storage.

Circle's Reflection.name: const/double/tau
Circle's Reflection.description: Adds τ, the radial representation of a complete circle, to the stack.

Trajectory Reflection.name: turret_lamp_normal
Trajectory Reflection.description: Pushes what direction the Pedestal this Lamp resides on is facing.

Vector Disintegration.name: deconstruct_vec
Vector Disintegration.description: Split a vector into its X, Y, and Z components (bottom to top).

Diver's Purification.name: breath
Diver's Purification.description: Removes a Living entity from the stack and returns how much breath it has left (i.e., how close it is to drowning).

Williams' Reflection II.name: readrodramremote
Williams' Reflection II.description: As Williams' Reflection, but can be cast from non-rod sources while a rod is in use.

Alter Scale.name: interop/pehkui/set
Alter Scale.description: Set the scale of the entity, passing in a proportion of their normal size. Costs about 1 Amethyst Shard.

Inferno Purification II.name: burning_time
Inferno Purification II.description: Pushes how long in seconds the entity will continue burning if not put out.

Spatial Reflection II.name: getdim2
Spatial Reflection II.description: Returns a Spatial Imprint representing the dimension my sentinel is currently in. Costs one-tenth of an amethyst dust.

Bunching Purification.name: blockstate_bunch
Bunching Purification.description: Pushes how many are in a bunch block, or Null otherwise. Useful only for candles, sea pickles, and turtle eggs.

White Sun's Zenith.name: potion/regeneration
White Sun's Zenith.description: Bestows regeneration. Base cost is one Amethyst Dust per second.

Archivist Reflection.name: index_grimoire
Archivist Reflection.description: Gets a list of all patterns modified by the Grimoire in my offhand.

Chronicler's Gambit.name: write/entity
Chronicler's Gambit.description: Like Scribe's Gambit, but the iota is written to an entity instead of my other hand.Interestingly enough, it looks like I cannot write my own Name using this spell. I get a sense that I might be endangered if I could.

Lung Purification.name: get_max_air
Lung Purification.description: Pushes the number of seconds an entity can last outside their normal breathing environment before they start suffocating.

Sisyphus' Gambit.name: sisyphus
Sisyphus' Gambit.description: Takes a pattern list and casts it over and over forever until it encounters either a Charon's Gambit or a Janus' Gambit.

Zone Distillation: Animal.name: zone_entity/animal
Zone Distillation: Animal.description: Take a position and maximum distance on the stack, and combine them into a list of animals near the position.

Zone Distillation: Non-Living.name: zone_entity/not_living
Zone Distillation: Non-Living.description: Take a position and maximum distance on the stack, and combine them into a list of non-living entities near the position.

Gulliver's Purification.name: interop/pehkui/get
Gulliver's Purification.description: Get the scale of the entity, as a proportion of their normal size. For most entities, this will be 1.

Aviator's Purification.name: flight/can_fly
Aviator's Purification.description: Returns whether the given player is under the effects of Anchorite's or Wayfarer's Flight.

Weave Mesh.name: weave_mesh
Weave Mesh.description: Takes a list of vectors, with constraints defined on the prior page, and weaves the mesh into that shape. Free.

Translate BIT.name: translatebit
Translate BIT.description:
Moves the BIT by the given offset.
(Compounds with multiple uses!)
Costs an amount of Amethyst Dust equal to the length of the offset vector.

Familiar's Reflection.name: wisp/seon/get
Familiar's Reflection.description: Returns my currently bound wisp. A new wisp can only be bound when this returns null. (This is not a great spell, I have simply placed it here for convenience.)

Zone Exaltation: Not-Type.name: zone_entity/not_type
Zone Exaltation: Not-Type.description: Remove an entity type, a position, and a radius from the stack, and returns a list of all entities not of that type within that radius of that position

Disallow Transfer Others.name: wisp/transfer/others/disallow
Disallow Transfer Others.description: This takes a wisp that you own and an index, and disallows the wisp from exchanging media with the linkable at that index.

Inverse Tangent Purification.name: arctan
Inverse Tangent Purification.description: Takes the inverse tangent of a value, yielding the angle whose tangent is that value. Related to the values of π and τ.

Restoration Purification.name: matrix/unmake
Restoration Purification.description: Converts the iota on top of the stack back from a matrix into a number, vector, or list depending on the vector's size.

Zone Distillation: Wisp.name: zone_entity/wisp
Zone Distillation: Wisp.description: Take a position and maximum distance on the stack, and combine them into a list of wisps near the position.

Externalize Pigment.name: paintconjured
Externalize Pigment.description: Accepts a vector and an itemtype representing a pigment. Costs a negligible amount of media if targeting my own block, or 1 Amethyst Dust if not.

Confetti.name: confetti
Confetti.description: Creates a loud bang similar to that of fireworks and a burst of colorful particles at a position, velocity, and speed. Costs about half of one Amethyst Dust.

Phase Block.name: interop/fabric_only/phase_block
Phase Block.description: Takes a position and a number, and phases the block at that position out for that many seconds. Costs one ten-thousandth of an Amethyst Dust times the square of the time to phase out for.

Menderbug's Reflection.name: getdurabilitymainhand
Menderbug's Reflection.description: Returns how many times the item in my other hand can be used without breaking, durability-manipulating effects notwithstanding.

Pigment Purification.name: to_pigment
Pigment Purification.description: Takes a colored dye iota and transforms it into a pigment, takes a player and returns their pigment, or takes an item containing a pigment and returns its pigment.

Conjure Speck.name: conjure_speck
Conjure Speck.description: Conjures a speck with the iota, position, and rotation. Costs a negligible amount of media. Pushes the speck iota to the stack.

Diagnosis Purification.name: get_effects_entity
Diagnosis Purification.description: Pushes a list of status effects the entity is afflicted with.

Autograph.name: autograph
Autograph.description: Permanently autographs the item in my offhand with my name and Pigment. Free and can only be done with my Staff, as a proof of care.

Logarithmic Distillation.name: logarithm
Logarithmic Distillation.description: Removes the number at the top of the stack, then takes the logarithm of the number at the top using the other number as its base. Related to the value of e.

Red Sun's Zenith.name: potion/haste
Red Sun's Zenith.description: Bestows haste. Base cost is one Amethyst Dust per 3 seconds.

Pharmacist's Dstln. II.name: getstatuslevel
Pharmacist's Dstln. II.description: Accepts an entity and a status effect type, and returns the effect on the target's potency.

Speaker's Distillation.name: construct
Speaker's Distillation.description: Remove the top iota, then add it as the first element to the list at the top of the stack.

Evade Reflection.name: moving_right
Evade Reflection.description: Pushes how many twentieths of a second I've been intending to , or -1 if I am not. Can be differentiated from Dodge Reflection because e comes to the right of d.

Ceiling Purification.name: ceil
Ceiling Purification.description: "Ceilings" a number, raising it to the next integer value if it has a fractional component. If passed a vector, instead ceils each of its components.

Thicken Speck.name: thickness_specklike
Thicken Speck.description: Changes the stroke thickness of a pattern speck, can range from 0 to 10. Represents twentieths of a block, and is zero by default.

Arc's Reflection.name: const/double/pi
Arc's Reflection.description: Adds π, the radial representation of half a circle, to the stack.

Identify Importance.name: shader_media
Identify Importance.description: Transforms my vision to perceive only the most important things...

Popularity Reflection.name: link/num
Popularity Reflection.description: Adds the number of links to the wisp to the stack.

Retreat Reflection.name: moving_down
Retreat Reflection.description: Pushes how many twentieths of a second I've been intending to , or -1 if I am not.

Retrograde Purification.name: reverse
Retrograde Purification.args:
List Manipulation: list → list  
Matrices: mat → mat
Retrograde Purification.description:
List Manipulation: Reverse the list at the top of the stack.

Matrices: Accepts an n by m matrix and returns an m by n matrix where every entry has been flipped along the diagonal.

Entity Purification.name: get_entity
Entity Purification.description: Transform the position on the stack into the entity at that location (or Null if there isn't one).

Inferno Reflection.name: getdim/nether
Inferno Reflection.description:
Returns a Spatial Imprint representing the nether. Costs one-tenth of an amethyst dust.
There seems to be some resistance when I cast this. Perhaps I'll be able to overcome it with greater skill...

Prestidigitation.name: prestidigitation
Prestidigitation.description: Causes a small magical effect on the block or entity, usually not too distinct from the original nature or function of the block or entity. Costs about a tenth of one Amethyst Dust.

Gate's Dismissal.name: gate/unmark
Gate's Dismissal.description: Consumes a gate iota and an entity. Unmarks that entity so that if it was marked with  Gate's Opening it will no longer be teleported the next time that gate is closed.

Scribe's Gambit.name: write
Scribe's Gambit.description: Remove the top iota from the stack, and save it into the item in my other hand.

Archgenie Reflection: Kinetic.name: get_arch_lamp_velocity
Archgenie Reflection: Kinetic.description: Pushes my original velocity when the arch lamp started casting.

Waystone Reflection.name: circle/impetus_pos
Waystone Reflection.description: Returns the position of the Impetus of this spell circle.

Conductor's Reflection II.name: rodloopactive
Conductor's Reflection II.description: Returns whether the caster is currently using a rod, regardless of the current cast is from that rod.

Atlas' Decomposition.name: getdimheight
Atlas' Decomposition.description: Accepts a Spatial Imprint, and returns the lowest and highest altitudes at which blocks can exist in the corresponding dimension.

Conjure Hexburst.name: conjure_hexburst
Conjure Hexburst.description: Conjures a Hexburst at the location with the given iota. Costs about one Amethyst Dust and is subject to the Transgress Others mishap.

Zone Distillation: Non-Wisp.name: zone_entity/not_wisp
Zone Distillation: Non-Wisp.description: Take a position and maximum distance on the stack, and combine them into a list of non-wisp entities near the position.

Move Speck.name: move_specklike
Move Speck.description: Moves a speck entity to the position.

Assessor's Reflection.name: writable
Assessor's Reflection.description: If I could save an iota into the item in my other hand, returns True. Otherwise, returns False.

Warehouse Purification.name: count_max_stack
Warehouse Purification.description: Takes in an item entity and pushes how many items that can stack in it.

Erase Item.name: erase
Erase Item.description: Clear a Hex-containing item in my other hand. Costs about one Amethyst Dust.

Archgenie Reflection: Temporal.name: get_arch_lamp_use_time
Archgenie Reflection: Temporal.description: Pushes how many times the arch lamp has cast since its activation. I can divide by by 20 to convert to seconds.

Magic Missile.name: magic_missile
Magic Missile.description: Conjures a small silver of amethyst that always deals a full heart of damage and forces the target backwards. Costs about one Amethyst Dust.

Conjunction Distillation.name: and
Conjunction Distillation.args:
Logical Operators: bool, bool → bool  
Blackboxes: blackbox, blackbox → blackbox  
Sets: (num, num)|(list, list) → num|list
Conjunction Distillation.description:
Logical Operators: Returns True if both arguments are true; otherwise returns False.

Blackboxes: Produces a Blackbox with only iotas common to both Blackboxes.

Sets: Takes the intersection of two sets.

Castor's Gambit.name: castor
Castor's Gambit.description: Should only be run within a Thoth's. Details on the next page. Beware of triggering the Delve Too Deep mishap.

Empower Mind Render.name: applymindrender
Empower Mind Render.description: Accepts an item or item frame bearing the Sharpness enchantment, and converts it into Mind Render of the same level. Cost is based on enchantment level, and increases by 50%% if the item is a book.

Dexterity Reflection.name: env_offhand
Dexterity Reflection.description: Pushes whether the most dominant hand of the caster is being used to cast this pattern. May work strangely for casters without hands...

Link.name: link
Link.description: Links the caster to the entity removed from the stack, which must be linkable. This costs one Amethyst Shard.

Fragility Purification.name: damage_max_stack
Fragility Purification.description: Takes in an item entity and pushes how much durability the item can have at its peak.

Conjure Compass.name: conjure_compass
Conjure Compass.description: Conjures a Conjured Compass at the location pointing towards the second vector, linked to the current dimension. Costs about three Amethyst Dust.

Compass' Purification.name: entity_pos/eye
Compass' Purification.description: Transforms an entity on the stack into the position of its eyes. I should probably use this on myself.

Dioscuri Gambit.name: 2dup
Dioscuri Gambit.args: any, any → any, any, any, any
Dioscuri Gambit.description: Copy the top two iotas of the stack. [0, 1] becomes [0, 1, 0, 1].

Mediafy Item.name: mote/make
Mediafy Item.description: Convert an item in the world (either an item entity or an item frame) into a mote on your stack. If passed an existing mote instead adds the items from the entity to the mote. Mediafying an item costs a tenth of an Amethyst Dust.

Inverse Purification.name: matrix/inverse
Inverse Purification.description: Accepts an n by n matrix and returns the n by n matrix such that in*out = identity.

Racer's Purification.name: is_sprinting
Racer's Purification.description: Pushes whether the entity is sprinting. Includes if I am swimming or if I have left the ground since sprinting and extends to cats, foxes, and more.

Fisherman's Gambit.name: fisherman
Fisherman's Gambit.description: Grabs the element in the stack indexed by the number and brings it to the top. If the number is negative, instead moves the top element of the stack down that many elements.

Glyphmaker's Distillation.name: shuffle_pattern
Glyphmaker's Distillation.description: Takes in a pattern and a number and produces a pattern of the same shape, but different stroke order. My notes reveal that ancient Hexcasters used this for some grand library.

Modify Block: Replaceable.name: modify_block_replaceable
Modify Block: Replaceable.description: This modifier is useful for construction! With this modifier applied, I find I can easily place another block in the place of the mage block.

Conjure Firework.name: conjure_firework
Conjure Firework.args: vec, vec, num, num, list of dyes, list of dyes, bool, bool →
Conjure Firework.description: Conjures a firework of my exact specifications. It may be one of the most complex spells in existence. Costs equivalently to the other firework spell.

Inculcate.name: internalize_hex
Inculcate.description: Etches a Hex, allowing me to cast it by holding  for one second. Costs about one Charged Amethyst.Anthony thought at it, and it turned a flip-flop on the grass, and lay trembling, its eyes gleaming in small black terror.

Apothecary's Purification.name: getstatus
Apothecary's Purification.description: Accepts a living entity, and returns a list of status iotas representing all effects on the target.

Caliper's Purification.name: entity_width
Caliper's Purification.description: Similar to Stadiometer's Purification but pushes the width of an entity rather than its height.

Break Block.name: break_block
Break Block.description:
Remove a location from the stack, then break the block at the given location. This spell can break nearly anything a Diamond Pickaxe can break.
Costs about an eighth of one Amethyst Dust, or a negligible amount if breaking a Conjured Block or Conjured Light.

Disjunction Distillation.name: or
Disjunction Distillation.args:
Logical Operators: bool, bool → bool  
Blackboxes: blackbox, blackbox → blackbox  
Sets: (num, num)|(list, list) → num|list
Disjunction Distillation.description:
Logical Operators: Returns True if at least one of the arguments are True; otherwise returns False.

Blackboxes: Combines the iota from both Blackboxes. The result is a Blackbox that contains iotas from both, although without duplicates.

Sets: Unifies two sets.

Entity Distillation: Status.name: getbystatussingle
Entity Distillation: Status.description: Accepts a status effect type and a vector, and returns an entity at that position which has that effect.

Kill BIT.name: killbit
Kill BIT.description: Kills & removes the given BIT.Costs about one Amethyst Dust.

Baton Reflection II.name: getrodpos
Baton Reflection II.description: When cast with a Reverberation Rod, returns my eye position from when I started the current cast loop.

Link Others.name: link/others
Link Others.description: May be evaluated by any casting instrument. Links two entities, which must be linkable. This costs one Amethyst Shard.

Classifier's Purification.name: classify
Classifier's Purification.description: Pushes the identifier of an iota's type. Can be used to determine whether two iota are the same type.

Division Distillation.name: div
Division Distillation.args:
Mathematics: num|vec, num|vec → num|vec  
Complexities: complex, num → complex  
Quaternionics: quaternion, num → quaternion  
Matrices: mat, mat → mat
Division Distillation.description:
Mathematics: Perform division or the cross product.

Complexities: Performs Scalar Division.

Quaternionics: Performs Scalar Division.

Matrices: Divides the first n by m matrix with an m by m matrix to get an n by m matrix.

Unlink Others.name: link/unlink/others
Unlink Others.description: Takes two linkables and unlinks them if they are linked. This costs two Amethyst Dust.

Finale.name: haltrod
Finale.description: When cast with a Reverberation Rod, forcibly halts the current cast loop.

Swindler's Gambit.name: swizzle
Swindler's Gambit.description: Rearranges the top elements of the stack based on the given numerical code, which is the index of the permutation wanted.

Roll Speck.name: roll_specklike
Roll Speck.description: Accepts a number between 0 and 1, representing a fraction of a full rotation, and rotates the speck's image by that amount.

Stealth Shroud.name: resistdetection
Stealth Shroud.description: Accepts a living entity and a number (n), and shields the entity from hex-based detection for n seconds. Costs two amethyst dust per second.

Quaterniation.name: mattoquat
Quaterniation.description: Pushes a quaternion that (should) reperesent the same rotation as the matrix

Orientation Purification.name: blockstate_rotation
Orientation Purification.description: Pushes the vector of the block's facing direction, or Null if the block does not have a facing direction.

Physician's Purification.name: type/entity
Physician's Purification.description: Remove an entity from the stack, and adds the type of the entity at that location to the stack.

Hunger Purification.name: get_player_hunger
Hunger Purification.description: Pushes how full a player is. I can imagine this as half-hunger-hunches.

Calligrapher's Purification.name: deserialize_pattern
Calligrapher's Purification.description: Turns a list of numbers back into a pattern. Applies a strange remainder effect to numbers outside of the 0-5 range to coerce it into a useable form. This is the inverse of Chirographer's Purification.

Angle Purification.name: blockstate_turn
Angle Purification.description: Pushes a number corresponding to the rotation of signs, skulls, and banners.

Zone Exaltation: Status.name: getbystatus
Zone Exaltation: Status.description: Accepts a status effect type, a vector, and a number (n), and returns a list of entities within radius n of the vector which have that effect.

Create Water.name: create_water
Create Water.description: Summon a block of water (or insert up to a bucket's worth) into a block at the given position. Costs about one Amethyst Dust.

Threading Reflection II.name: free
Threading Reflection II.description: Pushes the number of non-busy cassette slots that I currently have.

Janus' Gambit.name: janus
Janus' Gambit.description: Instantly terminates the Hex regardless of current circumstances, breaking even through Thoth's and Hermes' Gambit unlike Charon's Gambit.

Archgenie Purification.name: has_arch_lamp
Archgenie Purification.description: Pushes whether a player currently has an active arch lamp.

hexcasting.action.hextweaks:sbe_entities.name: sbe_entities
hexcasting.action.hextweaks:sbe_entities.description:
Gets all Active ritual entities within the specified range

HexTweaks also makes a mixin so Compass Prfn's no longer do a ambit check

Lamplighter's Purification.name: light_level
Lamplighter's Purification.description: Removes a position vector from the stack and returns the light level at that position.

Entity Purification: Player.name: get_entity/player
Entity Purification: Player.description: Transform the position on the stack into the player at that location (or Null if there isn't one).

Book Purification.name: blockstate_book
Book Purification.description: Pushes a boolean for whether lecterns or jukeboxes have a book/music disc in them respectively. I read that it may work for some kind of bookshelf involved in a great work too.

Metronome Reflection.name: getrodstamp
Metronome Reflection.description: When cast with a Reverberation Rod, returns the timestamp from when I started the current cast loop.

Lilypad Distillation.name: fluid_surface_raycast
Lilypad Distillation.description: Works similar to Architect's Distillation but targets only liquids, piercing through all other blocks.

Sloth's Purification.name: is_sleeping
Sloth's Purification.description: Pushes whether the entity is sleeping. Applies to players, cats, foxes, and a variety of other creatures.

Entity Purification: Item.name: get_entity/item
Entity Purification: Item.description: Transform the position on the stack into the dropped item at that location (or Null if there isn't one).

Charm Distillation.name: get_enchantment_strength
Charm Distillation.description: Gets the strength of the specific enchantment on the item.

Archer's Distillation.name: raycast
Archer's Distillation.description: Combines two vectors (a position and a direction) into the answer to the question: If I stood at the position and looked in the direction, what block would I be looking at? Costs a negligible amount of media.

Tangle Purification.name: read_mesh
Tangle Purification.description: Pushes the shape of a mesh as a list of vectors.

Flock's Gambit.name: last_n_list
Flock's Gambit.description: Remove num elements from the stack, then add them to a list at the top of the stack.

Identity Reflection.name: wisp/self
Identity Reflection.description: Add a reference to the casting wisp to the stack. This must be cast by a wisp; trying to cast it through a staff will fail rather spectacularly.

Genie Reflection: Kinetic.name: get_hand_lamp_velocity
Genie Reflection: Kinetic.description: Pushes my original velocity when I began using the lamp.

Spatial Reflection.name: getdim1
Spatial Reflection.description: Returns a Spatial Imprint representing the dimension I am currently in. Costs a negligible amount of media.

Scale BIT.name: scalebit
Scale BIT.description:
Scales the BIT by the given vector.
(Does not Compound with multiple uses!)
Costs an amount of Amethyst Dust equal to the length of the scale vector

Spit.name: llama_spit
Spit.description: Conjures a sticky low-damaging projectile. Costs about a fourth of one Amethyst Dust.

Summon Text Display.name: summontextdisplay
Summon Text Display.description: Summons a Text Display entity at the given position, displaying the given string. Costs about a Charged Amethyst

Hermes' Gambit.name: eval
Hermes' Gambit.description: Remove a pattern or list of patterns from the stack, then cast them as if I had drawn them myself with my Staff (until a Charon's Gambit is encountered). If an iota is escaped with Consideration or its ilk, it will be pushed to the stack. Otherwise, non-patterns will fail.

Whisper Reflection.name: string/chat/caster
Whisper Reflection.description: Adds the last message the caster sent to the stack as a string.

Instill Psyche.name: reviveflayed
Instill Psyche.description: Accepts a flayed mob, and creates an artifical pseudo-mind to inhabit its body. Costs 16 charged amethyst when used on a villager or allay, or 10 amethyst shards for anything else.

Cleanse Status.name: removestatus
Cleanse Status.description: Accepts an entity and a status effect type, and removes that status effect from the entity. Cost is based on the effect's innate harmfulness, its potency, and its remaining duration.

Staff Reflection.name: env_staff
Staff Reflection.description: Pushes whether a Staff is being used to cast this pattern.

Plumber's Purification.name: blockstate_waterlogged
Plumber's Purification.description: Pushes whether the block is waterlogged, or Null if the block can not be waterlogged.

Tchotchke Gambit.name: write_tchotchke
Tchotchke Gambit.description: Writes an iota to the Tchotchke's inner iota storage, which can be read back on future casts. Subject to the Transgress Others mishap and unreadable from any external source.

Archgenie Reflection: Memory.name: get_arch_lamp_storage
Archgenie Reflection: Memory.description: Can be cast by a casting device, Staff, or within the arch lamp to push the stored iota.

Miner's Purification.name: block_hardness
Miner's Purification.description: Pushes how difficult blocks of that block type are to mine.

Retrieve Idea.name: readidea
Retrieve Idea.description: Accepts a valid key, and returns the corresponding iota. Costs one-eigth of an amethyst dust.

Spatial Interchange.name: swapspace
Spatial Interchange.description: Accepts two lists of two vectors, to define two cuboids, and a Spatial Imprint. These cuboids must have the exact same dimensions and rotation.

Accelerate.name: tick
Accelerate.description: Causes the block at the passed vector to perform its normal actions faster in the instant that this spell is cast.

Decorator's Purification.name: readframerotation
Decorator's Purification.description: Accepts an item frame entity, and returns its rotation, from 0 to 7.

Geographical Purification.name: get_biome
Geographical Purification.description: Pushes the identifier of the biome type that the vector is within.

Broadcast Vision.name: shader_tv
Broadcast Vision.description: Alters my vision to contain strange lines and make objects towards the center of my vision bulge "towards" me. Seems to be in reference to something...

Sifter's Reflection.name: string/chat/prefix/get
Sifter's Reflection.description: Returns the last string you passed to Sifter's Gambit.

Sentience Purification.name: is_brainswept
Sentience Purification.description: Pushes whether an entity "has been magically relieved of its mind". I feel this is strongly related to Flay Mind somehow...

Enderman's Purification.name: is_wet
Enderman's Purification.description: Pushes whether the entity is touching rain, water, or in a bubble column.

Flock's Disintegration.name: splat
Flock's Disintegration.description: Remove the list at the top of the stack, then push its contents to the stack.

Ratio Purification.name: getdimscale
Ratio Purification.description: Accepts a Spatial Imprint, and returns how many blocks you'd have to travel in the overworld to travel the equivalent of one block in the input dimension.

Vector Exaltation.name: construct_vec
Vector Exaltation.description: Combine three numbers at the top of the stack into a vector's X, Y, and Z components (bottom to top).

Dequeue.name: dequeue
Dequeue.description: I can also automate killing cassettes with this pattern. It takes an iota and dequeues the cassette with that label if it exists.

Clear Vision.name: shader_clear
Clear Vision.description: Breaks any shader spell currently applied to me. Useful for "bleaching" my eyes after too much experimentation.

Genie Reflection: Memory.name: get_hand_lamp_storage
Genie Reflection: Memory.description: Requests the iota I had saved to the genie to be pushed to the top of the stack. If I had not previously saved anything, the genie pushes Null.

Tower Distillation.name: matrix/concat/vert
Tower Distillation.description: Accepts an n by m matrix and a p by m matrix and produces a (n+p) by m matrix by putting the first matrix on top of the second.

Altiora.name: flight
Altiora.description: Summon a sheaf of media about me in the shape of wings, endowed with enough substance to allow gliding.

Cosine Purification.name: cos
Cosine Purification.description: Takes the cosine of an angle in radians, yielding the horizontal component of that angle drawn on a unit circle. Related to the values of π and τ.

Moniker Purification.name: string/name/get
Moniker Purification.description: Takes an entity and returns that entity's name. If it is an item entity, return the item's name.

Chromatic Purification.name: get_dye
Chromatic Purification.description: Gets the dye of a block, entity, or block/item identifier.

Minimus Distillation II.name: less_eq
Minimus Distillation II.description: If the first argument is less than or equal to the second, return True. Otherwise, return False.

Theodolite's Purification.name: theodolite
Theodolite's Purification.description: Similar to Alidade's Purification but pushes the vector that points upwards from their head rather than the entity's facing vector.

Send Thought.name: send_telepathy
Send Thought.description: Momentarily displays an iota above my hotbar. If cast repeatedly, each cast overwrites the previous instantly.

Zone Distillation: Any.name: zone_entity
Zone Distillation: Any.description: Take a position and maximum distance on the stack, and combine them into a list of all entities near the position.

Treasurer's Distillation.name: item/prop/size/set
Treasurer's Distillation.description: Transforms the Item Stack at the top of the stack into its size.

Seniority Purification.name: mote/villager/level/get
Seniority Purification.description: Accepts a villager, returns a number representing that villager's seniority and skill at their craft.

Charon's Gambit.name: halt
Charon's Gambit.description: This pattern forcibly halts a Hex. This is mostly useless on its own, as I could simply just stop writing patterns, or put down my staff.

Pierce Darkness.name: shader_owl
Pierce Darkness.description: Greatly augments my ability to see in the dark, although the light resultingly becomes extremely blinding.

Concentration Distillation.name: get_effect_amplifier
Concentration Distillation.description: Pushes the potency of the specific effect acting on the entity or Null if the entity doesn't have it.

Pathfinder's Gambit.name: wisp/move/target/set
Pathfinder's Gambit.description: Removes a position vector from the stack; The Cyclic Wisp that executed this pattern will move in a straight line towards that position (colliding with terrain in its path) until it reaches it.

Media Reflection.name: env_media
Media Reflection.description: Pushes the media available to this current cast.

Peripheral Purification.name: get_comparator
Peripheral Purification.description: Pushes the power level a comparator would output if pressed against a position.

Inverse Tangent Purification II.name: arctan2
Inverse Tangent Purification II.description: Takes the inverse tangent of a Y and X value, yielding the angle between the X-axis and a line from the origin to that point.

Conjure Block.name: conjure_block
Conjure Block.description: Conjure an ethereal, but solid, block that sparkles with my pigment at the given position. Costs about one Amethyst Dust.

Subtractive Distillation.name: sub
Subtractive Distillation.args:
Mathematics: num|vec, num|vec → num|vec  
Complexities: complex, complex/num → complex  
Quaternionics: qrtn, qtrn → quaternion
Subtractive Distillation.description:
Mathematics: Perform subtraction.

Complexities: Performs Subtraction, num will be treated as num + 0i.

Quaternionics: Performs Subtraction

Depot Purification.name: mote/storage/get
Depot Purification.description: Get the position of the Mote Nexus that contains the passed mote.

Unclogging Gambit.name: link/comm/clear
Unclogging Gambit.description: Removes all unread iota from the caster's received iota queue.

Postman's Gambit.name: revealtoother
Postman's Gambit.description: Accepts a player and any iota less than 256 characters long, and shows that iota to them as if they had cast Reveal, also telling them who sent the message. Cost is inversely proportional to the length of time since they were last targeted by this spell.

Temporal Reflection.name: get_time
Temporal Reflection.description: Pushes the age of the world for timekeeping, unaffected by events such as sleeping. Divided by 20, it returns seconds.

Sine Purification.name: sin
Sine Purification.description: Takes the sine of an angle in radians, yielding the vertical component of that angle drawn on a unit circle. Related to the values of π and τ.

Conjure Light.name: conjure_light
Conjure Light.description: Conjure a magical light that softly glows with my pigment at the given position. Costs about one Amethyst Dust.

Plane Reflection.name: get_dimension
Plane Reflection.description: Pushes the identifier of the dimension the Hex is being cast in.

Clearance Distillation.name: get_effect_duration
Clearance Distillation.description: Pushes how long the effect will last in seconds or Null if the entity doesn't have it.

Wayfarer's Flight.name: flight/time
Wayfarer's Flight.description: A flight limited in its duration.

Comma Reflection.name: string/comma
Comma Reflection.description: Add a comma string to the stack, useful for combining with other strings.

Dodge Reflection.name: moving_left
Dodge Reflection.description: Pushes how many twentieths of a second I've been intending to , or -1 if I am not. Can be differentiated from Evade Reflection because d comes to the left of e.

Youth Purification.name: is_baby
Youth Purification.description: Pushes whether a living creature is in its baby form. Also works on armor stands oddly.

Pocket Reflection II.name: wristpocket_count
Pocket Reflection II.description: Returns how many items I have in my wristpocket, or 0 if it is empty.

Metronome Gambit.name: delayrod
Metronome Gambit.description: Accepts a positive integer. When cast with a Reverberation Rod, delays the current cast loop's next cast until that many twentieths of a second have passed.

Zone Distillation: Speck.name: zone_specklike
Zone Distillation: Speck.description: Returns specks similarly to other zone distillation patterns.

Network Gateway.name: networktp
Network Gateway.description: Accepts an entity to teleport, a linkable to use for access to its network, and a destination. If the entity is within 8 blocks of the linkable, and there is a network node within 4 blocks of the destination, the entity will be teleported. Cost varies based on what entity is teleported.

Inverse Cosine Purification.name: arccos
Inverse Cosine Purification.description: Takes the inverse cosine of a value with absolute value 1 or less, yielding the angle whose cosine is that value. Related to the values of π and τ.

Soroban Reflection II.name: soroban_decrement
Soroban Reflection II.description: Pushes soroban's current value and then decreases it.

Iris' Gambit.name: eval/cc
Iris' Gambit.description: Cast a pattern or list of patterns from the stack exactly like Hermes' Gambit, except that a unique "Jump" iota is pushed to the stack beforehand.

Postman's Gambit II.name: clearrevealcost
Postman's Gambit II.description: Resets the cost of sending me a message via Postman's Gambit back to 1/10 of a dust. Costs 1/10 of a dust.
