Stamina Purification.name: get_player_saturation
Stamina Purification.description: Pushes my saturation, which roughly correlates to how long the player will remain full.

Handwriting Distillation.name: draw_pattern
Handwriting Distillation.description: Takes a pattern and transforms it into a normalized list of vectors. I feel this may be useful for artistic spells.

Gate's Reflection.name: gate/make
Gate's Reflection.description: Adds a new gate iota to the stack. Any copy of this iota will point to the same numbered gate. Costs 32 Charged Amethyst. If passed null, makes a Drifting Gate. If passed a vector, makes a Location Anchored Gate, If passed a vector and an entity, makes an Entity Anchored Gate.

Displace.name: displace
Displace.description: Teleports an entity within the circle to any other point inside within the same circle. Unlike Greater Teleport, this spell takes in world coordinates rather than an offset. Free.

Thoth's Gambit.name: for_each
Thoth's Gambit.description: Remove a list of patterns and a list from the stack, then cast the given pattern over each element of the second list.

Illuminate Ink.name: glow_scroll
Illuminate Ink.description: Causes the ink of an Animated Scroll to brightly glow, regardless of lighting conditions.

Network Distillation.name: networkscan
Network Distillation.description: Scans the link network connected to the input linkable up to a recursion depth equal to the input number (max 32), and returns a list of all connected linkables. Costs a negligible amount of media.

Scrutinize Sentinel.name: readsentinel
Scrutinize Sentinel.description: Accepts a vector and a player, and returns either the distance from the vector to the target player's sentinel or NULL. Costs a negligible amount of media.

Jester's Gambit.name: swap
Jester's Gambit.description: Swaps the top two iotas of the stack.

Zone Distillation: Not BIT.name: zone_entity/not_bit
Zone Distillation: Not BIT.description: Take a position and a maximum distance on the stack, and combine them into a list of non-BIT's near the position.

Edibility Purification.name: edible
Edibility Purification.description: Takes in an item identifier and pushes whether I can eat it.

Reproduction Purification.name: breedable
Reproduction Purification.description: Pushes whether an animal creature is in love and ready to mate, or Null if that creature is not capable of that type of reproduction.

Tool Purification.name: get_mainhand_stack
Tool Purification.description: Returns the type of item in my mainhand.

Mitosis Gambit.name: matrix/split/hori
Mitosis Gambit.description: Accepts an n by m matrix and an int from 0 to m, and returns two matrices created by splitting the input matrix horizontally at the inputted int.

Return Item.name: mote/return
Return Item.description: Returns all the items from a mote to the world at the location of your choosing. If passed a number returns at most that many items. Costs a tenth of an Amethyst Dust.

Vacant Reflection.name: empty_list
Vacant Reflection.description: Push an empty list to the top of the stack.

Summon Sentinel.name: sentinel/create
Summon Sentinel.description: Summons my sentinel at the given position. Costs about one Amethyst Dust.

Summon Item Display.name: summonitemdisplay
Summon Item Display.description:
Summons an Item Display entity at the given position, displaying the given item (The string must be the internal name i.e "minecraft:stick", not "Stick").
Costs about a Charged Amethyst

Thaumaturgist's Purification.name: get_enchantments
Thaumaturgist's Purification.description: Gets a list of enchantments the item has.

Infuse Will.name: infusion
Infuse Will.description:
Takes a pattern and makes it unique to me by injecting patterns that I cannot draw by hand
also seems to put more power into certain spells

Zone Distillation: Non-Monster.name: zone_entity/not_monster
Zone Distillation: Non-Monster.description: Take a position and maximum distance on the stack, and combine them into a list of non-monster entities near the position.

Pace Purification.name: get_entity_velocity
Pace Purification.description: Transforms an entity on the stack into the direction in which it's moving, with the speed of that movement as that direction's magnitude.

Write.name: string/block/set
Write.description: Removes a vector and a string from the stack. If that vector is pointing at a sign or lectern, it writes that string to that sign or lectern. Costs a hundredth of an Amethyst Dust.

Dye Ink.name: color_scroll
Dye Ink.description: Changes the color of an Animated Scroll's ink to the color specified by the vector, with the components being 0 to 1 values of red, green, and blue respectively.

Storage Purification.name: count_stack
Storage Purification.description: Takes in an item entity and pushes how many items are in it.

Ablation Purification.name: getabsorption
Ablation Purification.description: Accepts a living entity, and returns how much damage it can Absorb before its health is affected.

Prescription Purification.name: get_effects_item
Prescription Purification.description: Pushes a list of status effects the food or potion will bestow.

Suffocation Purification.name: get_air
Suffocation Purification.description: Pushes the number of seconds before an entity will start to suffocate. This applies to marine creatures out of water as well as land creatures in water.

Elysium's Gambit.name: everbook/write
Elysium's Gambit.description: Takes the position of an Akashic Record, as well as a Pattern as a key, and stores the iota in that record at that key to your Everbook at the same key.

Conjure Hextito.name: conjure_hextito
Conjure Hextito.description: Conjures a Hextito at the location with the given Hex. Costs about two Amethyst Dust and is subject to the Transgress Others mishap.

Uniqueness Purification.name: unique
Uniqueness Purification.description: Removes duplicate entries from a list.

True Reflection.name: const/true
True Reflection.description: Adds True to the top of the stack.

Thanatos' Reflection.name: thanatos
Thanatos' Reflection.description: Adds the number of patterns a Hex is still capable of evaluating to the stack. This is reduced by one for each pattern cast by the Hex.

Progress Gambit.name: page/right
Progress Gambit.description: Turns the spellbook that your are holding one page to the right

Athena's Revelation.name: athena_print
Athena's Revelation.description: Prints the last mishap that was caught by Athena's Gambit.Keep moving forward.

Smelt.name: smelt
Smelt.description: Remove a location, item entity, or mote from the stack, then either smelt the block at the location or smelt all the items in the item entity or mote.

Fitness Purification.name: get_max_health
Fitness Purification.description: Pushes how much health an entity can have at its prime. I can think of these in terms of half-hearts.

Paint Speck.name: pigment_specklike
Paint Speck.description: Splashes a pigment iota onto the speck, changing its color after creation.

Additive Distillation.name: add
Additive Distillation.args:
Mathematics: num|vec, num|vec → num|vec  
List Manipulation: list, list → list  
Complexities: complex, complex/num → complex  
Quaternionics: qtrn, qtrn → quaternion  
Matrices: mat, mat → mat  
Strings: str, str → str  
Motes: mote, mote → mote
Additive Distillation.description:
Mathematics: Perform addition.

List Manipulation: Remove the list at the top of the stack, then add all its elements to the end of the list at the top of the stack.

Complexities: Performs Addition, num will be treated as num + 0i.

Quaternionics: Performs Addition

Matrices: Adds two matrices together; they must have the same number of columns and rows.

Strings: Removes the top two strings from the stack and combines them together.

Motes: Combines two motes into one, merging the mote records they point to. Any pointers to the second mote will become null, any pointers to the first will remain. This can make motes holding many more items than I could carry in a stack naturally!

Reservoir Reflection.name: wisp/media
Reservoir Reflection.description: Add the amount of media in the wisp's reservoir to the stack. This must be cast by a wisp; trying to cast it through a staff will fail rather spectacularly.

Scout's Distillation.name: raycast/entity
Scout's Distillation.description: Like Archer's Distillation, but instead returns the entity I am looking at. Costs a negligible amount of media.

Program Purification.name: inspect
Program Purification.description: Pushes null if I do not have an active cassette with that label, or the cassette's Hex if I do. I hear rumors of this being used for iota storage and passing information between Hexes.

Rotation Gambit II.name: rotate_reverse
Rotation Gambit II.args: any, any, any → any, any, any
Rotation Gambit II.description: Yanks the top iota to the third position. [0, 1, 2] becomes [2, 0, 1].

Speaker's Decomposition.name: deconstruct
Speaker's Decomposition.description: Remove the first iota from the list at the top of the stack, then push that iota to the stack.

Length Purification.name: abs
Length Purification.args:
Mathematics: num|vec → number  
Logical Operators: bool → number  
Items: item stack → int  
List Manipulation: list → num  
Blackboxes: blackbox → number  
Complexities: complex → num  
Quaternionics: quaternion → num  
Strings: str → num  
Gates: gate → num  
Motes: mote → int
Length Purification.description:
Mathematics: Compute the absolute value or length.

Logical Operators: Convert a boolean to a number; True becomes 1, and False becomes 0.

Items: Transforms the Item Stack at the top of the stack into its size.

List Manipulation: Remove the list at the top of the stack, then push the number of elements in the list to the stack.

Blackboxes: Pushes the number of iotas contained within the Blackbox.

Complexities: Pushes the Argument (the length).

Quaternionics: Pushes the Argument (the length).

Strings: Removes a string and returns its length.

Gates: Consumes a gate iota, returns how many entities are marked by that gate.

Motes: Accepts a mote and returns the number of items in the record referenced by that mote.

Quaternionic Dntg..name: qunmake
Quaternionic Dntg..description: Pushes the real coefficient and a vector where the x, y, & z components are the coefficients of i, j, & k respectively.

Pollux's Gambit.name: pollux
Pollux's Gambit.description: Sibling pattern to Castor's Gambit, this pattern schedules the additional iteration for the end instead. Carries the same risk of encountering the Delve Too Deep mishap.

Offering Purification.name: mote/trade/get
Offering Purification.description: Accepts a villager and returns all of the trades that villager is offering. This is a list of lists of lists. Each trade comprises two lists, the cost, and the returned items. The returned items is a list containing the type of item, and the number of items.

Inscribe Idea.name: writeidea
Inscribe Idea.description: Accepts a valid key and any iota, and stores it in the corresponding location. Costs a quarter of an amethyst dust.

Green Sun's Zenith.name: potion/strength
Green Sun's Zenith.description: Bestows strength. Base cost is one Amethyst Dust per 3 seconds.

Calorie Purification.name: get_hunger
Calorie Purification.description: Takes in an item identifier and pushes the amount it will fill me.

Archgenie Reflection: Spatial.name: get_arch_lamp_position
Archgenie Reflection: Spatial.description: Pushes my original position when the arch lamp started casting.

Observation Purification.name: observe_property
Observation Purification.description: Observes the current value of the property iota. Free to use.

Freeze.name: freeze
Freeze.description: Freezes the block at a block location. For example, turns water into ice, and ice into packed ice. Costs one Amethyst Dust.

Matrixification.name: quattomat
Matrixification.description: Pushes a matrix that (should) represent the same rotation as the quaternion

Squire's Purification.name: armour
Squire's Purification.description: Removes a Living entity from the stack and returns how much armour it has.

Hidden Sun's Zenith.name: invisibility
Hidden Sun's Zenith.description: Functions just like the normal Zeniths, applying Invisibility. Costs one amethyst dust per three seconds.

Augur's Exaltation.name: if
Augur's Exaltation.description: If the first argument is True, keeps the second and discards the third; otherwise discards the second and keeps the third.

Place Block.name: place_block
Place Block.description:
Remove a location from the stack, then pick a block item and place it at the given location.
Costs about an eighth of one Amethyst Dust.

Allow Transfer.name: wisp/transfer/allow
Allow Transfer.description: When two wisps are linked together, they transfer media between each other until they are balanced. By default this only happens between wisps with the same owner. This takes an index, and explicitly allows the wisp to exchange media with the linkable at that index.

Bubbles' Purification.name: bubble
Bubbles' Purification.description: Pushes a Bubbled Iota, which when popped via execution (by Hermes' or the likes), will push the contained iota to the stack.

Recitation Reflection.name: link/comm/read
Recitation Reflection.description: When something receives an iota along a link it is added to a queue. This pattern adds the first iota in the queue to the stack, removing it from the queue.

Soroban Reflection.name: soroban_increment
Soroban Reflection.description: Pushes soroban's current value and then increases it. Starts at 0.

Zone Distillation: Non-Item.name: zone_entity/not_item
Zone Distillation: Non-Item.description: Take a position and maximum distance on the stack, and combine them into a list of non-dropped-item entities near the position.

Farmer's Purification.name: blockstate_crop
Farmer's Purification.description: Pushes a number 0 to 1, corresponding to how grown that crop is, as well as beehives, composters, and cauldrons. Strangely works on cakes too.

Telepathic Reflection.name: get_telepathy
Telepathic Reflection.description: By focusing on a particular image, I can detect that concentration via this pattern. Pushes how many twentieths of a second I've been intending to , or -1 if I am not.

Bind Storage.name: mote/storage/bind
Bind Storage.description: Target a Mote Nexus block in the world and bind yourself to it, meaning all items you mediafy will be added to that nexus' capacity. Targeting any other block will unbind you from your currently bound nexus. Costs 32 Amethyst Dust.

Conjure Mesh.name: conjure_mesh
Conjure Mesh.description: Conjures a mesh with the location and leaves a mesh entity on the stack. Costs about one Amethyst Dust.

Baton Reflection.name: getrodlook
Baton Reflection.description: When cast with a Reverberation Rod, returns my look vector from when I started the current cast loop.

Modify Block: Bouncy.name: modify_block_bouncy
Modify Block: Bouncy.description: This modifier makes the block delightfully fun to bounce on! It returns more force to me than regular slime blocks and I notice even if I sneak, the block bounces me regardless.

Time Speck.name: lifetime_specklike
Time Speck.description: Commands the speck to disappear after that many twentieths of a second.

Sign Item.name: signitem
Sign Item.description:
Invisibly engraves my soulprint onto the item in my other hand, or erases it if it is already there. Costs 1 amethyst dust.
I should be careful to seal any focuses or similar that I sign, as acquiring an unsealed signed focus may allow someone to impersonate me, and Erase Item gets rid of the signature.

Zone Distillation: Living.name: zone_entity/living
Zone Distillation: Living.description: Take a position and maximum distance on the stack, and combine them into a list of living creatures near the position.

Summon Greater Sentinel.name: sentinel/create/great
Summon Greater Sentinel.description: Summon a greater version of my Sentinel. Costs about two Amethyst Dust.

Lethe's Gambit.name: everbook/delete
Lethe's Gambit.description: Takes a pattern and removes the entry with that pattern key from your Everbook.

Integration Distillation.name: append
Integration Distillation.args:
List Manipulation: list, any → list  
Blackboxes: blackbox, any → blackbox
Integration Distillation.description:
List Manipulation: Remove the top of the stack, then add it to the end of the list at the top of the stack.

Blackboxes: Adds an iota to the Blackbox. Bypasses the Transgress Others mishap.

Device Reflection.name: env_packaged_hex
Device Reflection.description: Pushes whether any form of casting device is being used to cast this pattern.

Factorial Purification.name: factorial
Factorial Purification.description: Takes a number from the stack and computes its factorial, for example inputting 4 would return 4*3*2*1=24.

False Reflection.name: const/false
False Reflection.description: Adds False to the top of the stack.

Williams' Gambit.name: writerodram
Williams' Gambit.description: Accepts a non-list iota, and stores it inside the current cast loop. It will be lost when the cast loop ends.

Scribe's Reflection.name: read
Scribe's Reflection.description: Copy the iota stored in the item in my other hand and add it to the stack.

Nullary Reflection.name: const/null
Nullary Reflection.description: Adds the Null influence to the top of the stack.

Uplifting Resonance.name: applynotmissing
Uplifting Resonance.description: Accepts a living entity, and allows it to be accessed from anywhere for one minute. Has a base cost of one amethyst shard, plus one additional shard per application before allowing it to expire.

Demoman's Purification.name: block_blast_resistance
Demoman's Purification.description: Pushes how resistant blocks of that block type are to explosions.

Dye.name: dye
Dye.description: Dyes a dyeable block or entity. Costs about an eighth of one Amethyst Dust.

Modify Block: Invisible.name: modify_block_invisible
Modify Block: Invisible.description: This modifier prevents the block from emitting the telltale particles that accompany my casting, even when being stood on.

Red Sun's Nadir.name: potion/poison
Red Sun's Nadir.description: Inflicts poison. Base cost is one Amethyst Dust per 3 seconds.

Particle Burst.name: particleburst
Particle Burst.description: Accepts two vectors and two numbers, and uses them to define a burst of particles. Costs a negligible amount of media.

Menderbug's Reflection II.name: getdurabilityoffhand
Menderbug's Reflection II.description: As previous, targeting the item in the hand I'm casting this with. Most useful with delayed casts of one form or another.

Flay Mind.name: brainsweep
Flay Mind.description: I cannot make heads or tails of this spell... To be honest, I'm not sure I want to know what it does.

Mage Mouth.name: mage_mouth
Mage Mouth.description: Makes me eat my wristpocketed item, nourishing me or applying potions to me. Costs about one Amethyst Dust and mishaps if the item is not edible.

Bind Wisp.name: wisp/seon/set
Bind Wisp.description: Bind one of my wisps closer to me; I may only have one bound wisp at a time, but whichever wisp is bound costs significantly less upkeep and increased range.

Pharmacist's Distillation.name: getstatusduration
Pharmacist's Distillation.description: Accepts an entity and a status effect type, and returns the effect on the target's duration in seconds.

Falling Block.name: falling_block
Falling Block.description: Remove a location from the stack, and force the block there to fall as if it were sand or gravel. Costs one and a half Amethyst Dust.

Architect's Distillation.name: raycast/axis
Architect's Distillation.description: Like Archer's Distillation, but instead returns a vector representing the answer to the question: Which side of the block am I looking at? Costs a negligible amount of media.

Conduct Rod.name: craftrod
Conduct Rod.description: Acts just like the spells used to program conventional casting items. Costs 10 Charged Amethyst.

Librarian's Purification.name: key_shelf
Librarian's Purification.description: Reads the pattern key of an akashic bookshelf.

Normals reflection.name: normal
Normals reflection.description: Returns the normal of the slate the Wave is on in the Spell Circle

Recognition Purification.name: link/get_index
Recognition Purification.description: Removes an entity from the stack, and adds the index to the link to that entity to the stack (or -1 if the caster isn't linked to that entity).

Dessert Purification.name: is_snack
Dessert Purification.description: Takes in an item identifier and pushes whether it's a snack, meaning I can eat it really quickly.

Archgenie Reflection: Media.name: get_arch_lamp_media
Archgenie Reflection: Media.description: Pushes the remaining amount of media left in the arch lamp, in units of dust.

Nurse's Purification.name: health
Nurse's Purification.description: Removes a Living entity from the stack and returns how much health it has left (i.e., how close it is to dying).

Case Distillation.name: string/case
Case Distillation.description: Removes a string and a bool or null. If it was true, return the string in upper case. If false, lowercase. If null, toggle each character's case.

Scout's Exaltation.name: filteredentityraycast
Scout's Exaltation.description: As Scout's Distillation, but also accepts a list of entity type iotas. Any entity whose type is not present in the list will be ignored. Costs an amount of media slightly less negligible than that of the aforementioned pattern.

Squawk.name: parrot
Squawk.description: Emits a sound associated with a mob near a location, as though a parrot had imitated that mob. Costs about a half of an Amethyst Dust.

Laser Exaltation.name: piercing_surface_raycast
Laser Exaltation.description: Works similar to Architect's Distillation but accepts an additional identifier. It will pierce all blocks until it hits the block specified by the identifier.

Blue Sun's Zenith.name: potion/night_vision
Blue Sun's Zenith.description: Bestows night vision. Base cost is one Amethyst Dust per 5 seconds.

Preview Craft.name: mote/craft/preview
Preview Craft.description: Takes the same input as Craft, except it can take Item Stack Iotas as well as motes. Returns a list of Item Stack Iotas representing what the results of Craft would have been with motes containing those inputs.

Unlink.name: link/unlink
Unlink.description: Removes the link at the given index from the caster's links. This costs two Amethyst Dust.

Inferno Purification.name: is_burning
Inferno Purification.description: Pushes whether the entity is burning. Also applies to entities that are visually on fire, even if they are immune to fire, such as blazes attacking.

Railgun Exaltation.name: piercing_raycast
Railgun Exaltation.description: Works similar to Archer's Distillation but accepts an additional identifier. It will pierce all blocks until it hits the block specified by the identifier.

Media Infusion.name: infusemedia
Media Infusion.description: Accepts a vector and infuses media into the corresponding block in order to transmute it. Cost and exact effect vary depending on target.

Lock Purification.name: blockstate_lock
Lock Purification.description: Pushes a boolean for whether the block is currently in a "open" state, for example doors, trapdoors, fence gates, and open barrels.

Stacking Distillation II.name: mote/combinable
Stacking Distillation II.description: Returns true if the first mote can be combined with the items in the second argument (which can be a mote, item stack, item entity, or item frame), and false otherwise.

Determinant Purification.name: matrix/determinant
Determinant Purification.description: Accepts a square matrix and returns the determinant of that matrix. Mishaps for matrices larger than 4x4.

Entity Purification: Living.name: get_entity/living
Entity Purification: Living.description: Transform the position on the stack into the living creature at that location (or Null if there isn't one).

Deterioration Purification.name: damage_stack
Deterioration Purification.description: Takes in an item entity and pushes how much damage the item has sustained.

Vitality Purification.name: get_health
Vitality Purification.description: Pushes how close an entity is to death. I can think of these in terms of half-hearts.

Atalanta's Gambit.name: atalanta
Atalanta's Gambit.description: Should only be run inside Thoth's or Sisyphus' Gambit. Acts similarly to Charon's Gambit except does not end the iterator, only skips the rest of the current iteration.

Enqueue.name: enqueue
Enqueue.description: Enqueues a Hex to cast after that many twentieths of a second. It takes an iota to use as the label for the cassette.

Meterologist's Reflection.name: get_weather
Meterologist's Reflection.description: Pushes a number corresponding to the weather. 0 for clear, 1 for rain, and 2 for thundering.

Conjure Fireball.name: ghast_fireball
Conjure Fireball.description: Conjures an explosive fireball that can be punched and damages blocks and leaves an entity reference at the top of the stack. Costs about three Amethyst Dust.

Close Transmit.name: link/comm/close_transmit
Close Transmit.description: When drawn after Open Transmit I stop transmitting drawn patterns. If either Open Transmit or Close Transmit are executed by an intermediary caster such as a wisp, they will mishap.

Patternmaster's Purification.name: string/action
Patternmaster's Purification.description: Converts the pattern on top of the stack into the string for that pattern's name. If there is no action associated with that pattern, or if the associated pattern is a Great Spell, it returns null.

Locate Sentinel.name: sentinel/get_pos
Locate Sentinel.description: Add the position of my sentinel to the stack, or Null if it isn't summoned. Costs a negligible amount of media.

Auditor's Reflection.name: readable
Auditor's Reflection.description: If the item in my other hand holds an iota I can read, returns True. Otherwise, returns False.

Explosion.name: explode
Explosion.description: Remove a number and vector from the stack, then create an explosion at the given location with the given power.

Wander.name: wisp/trigger/move
Wander.description: The wisp's next cast will not occur until it has reached the position it is navigating towards.

Input Purification.name: string/parse
Input Purification.description: Removes a string from the top of the stack and returns the number that string parses as (or null if it doesn't parse).

Make Genie.name: recharge_lamp
Make Genie.description: Borrow the experiences and memory of a villager and transforms it into a genie to serve the lamp in my offhand. The spell itself costs about one Charged Amethyst, plus the media I'm giving the lamp.

Entropy Reflection.name: random
Entropy Reflection.description: Creates a random number between 0 and 1.

Quaternionic Exal..name: qmake
Quaternionic Exal..description: Pushes a Quaternion with num as the real coefficient and the vector's x, y, & z as the coefficients of i, j & k respectively.

Craft.name: mote/craft
Craft.description: Takes a mote, list of motes, or list of list of motes. returns a list containing the results of crafting with those items. For example, the input Stone x128 would return [Stone Button x128].

Multiplicative Distillation II.name: altmul
Multiplicative Distillation II.description: Multiplies the first n by m matrix elementwise with another n by m matrix.

Williams' Gambit II.name: writerodramremote
Williams' Gambit II.description: As Williams' Gambit, but can be cast from non-rod sources while a rod is in use.

Reader's Purification.name: string/block/get
Reader's Purification.description: Removes a vector from the stack. If that vector is pointing at a sign or lectern, it returns that sign or lectern's text to the stack. Otherwise, it returns null.

Consume Wisp.name: wisp/consume
Consume Wisp.description: Remove a wisp from the stack, and disassemble the wisp. The patterns contained are lost, but the media that it contained can be repurposed if this spell is cast by another wisp.

Librarian's Gambit.name: write_shelf
Librarian's Gambit.description: Writes an iota under a pattern key to an akashic bookshelf.

Impulse.name: add_motion
Impulse.description:
Remove an entity and direction from the stack, then give a shove to the given entity in the given direction. The strength of the impulse is determined by the length of the vector.
Costs units of Amethyst Dust equal to the square of the length of the vector, plus one for every Impulse except the first targeting an entity.

Schr\u00f6dinger's Gambit.name: set_property
Schr\u00f6dinger's Gambit.description: Sets the property iota. Costs about a tenth of a dust. All future observations of the property iota return the new value.

Marked Distillation.name: gate/mark/get
Marked Distillation.description: Consumes a gate iota and an entity, returns whether that entity is marked by that gate.

Sorter's Purification.name: type/to_item
Sorter's Purification.args:
Types: itemtypable → itemtype  
Items: item stack → itemtype
Sorter's Purification.description:
Types: Remove an iota with an associated item type (for example a location and the type of the block at that location, an item entity, or an item frame) from the stack and returns the item type to the stack (e.g. Grass, Stone, Stick, etc.).

Items: Transforms the Item Stack at the top of the stack into its Item.

Wish.name: wish
Wish.description: Wish the genie to cast a Hex for me. Because I am teaching a mind rather than etching a casting device, I can freely reteach the genie a new Hex any time without losing media.

Pigment Exaltation.name: sample_pigment
Pigment Exaltation.description: Samples the pigment at a certain place and time as a vector, where each component is from 0 to 1 and represents the red, green, and blueness respectively.

Finale Reflection.name: lamp_finale
Finale Reflection.args:
Hand Lamps:  → boolean  
Archgenie Lamps:  → boolean
Finale Reflection.description:
Hand Lamps: The instant I let go of my lamp, it casts an additional time. I can use this pattern to recognize whether a cast is that finale, and react accordingly.

Archgenie Lamps: When an archgenie lamp is turned off, it casts an additional time. I can use this pattern to recognize when whether a cast is that last burst of energy.

Write Grimoire.name: write_grimoire
Write Grimoire.description: Associates a pattern to a list of patterns in the Grimoire in my offhand.

Simulate Firework.name: simulate_firework
Simulate Firework.description: Analyzes the Firework Star in my other hand and conjures a firework of that star, with the position, velocity, and gunpowder amount specified. Costs about one Amethyst Shard.

Caster's Glamour.name: cycle_variant
Caster's Glamour.description: Certain items I create seem oddly receptive to the influence of media. By holding a Cypher, Trinket, Artifact, Focus, or Spellbook in my other hand, I can use this spell to change the appearance of the item. Costs about one Amethyst Dust.

Induce Mending.name: repair
Induce Mending.description: Accepts a raw media item on the ground, and attempts to use it to repair a tool in my other hand.

Identity Purification.name: matrix/identity
Identity Purification.description: Accepts a positive integer n, and returns an n by n matrix with 1 along the diagonal and 0 elsewhere.

Myodesopsia.name: myodesopsia
Myodesopsia.description: Conjures a swirl of patterns around me that I and nearby players can see, using the patterns from the list. Free.

Recharge Item.name: recharge
Recharge Item.description: Recharge a media-containing item in my other hand. Costs about one Amethyst Shard.

Wayfind Sentinel.name: sentinel/wayfind
Wayfind Sentinel.description: Transform the position vector on the top of the stack into a unit vector pointing from that position to my sentinel, or Null if it isn't summoned. Costs a negligible amount of media.

Boxer's Purification.name: toughness
Boxer's Purification.description: Removes a Living entity from the stack and returns how much toughness it has (another property of armour).

Chronicler's Purification.name: read/entity
Chronicler's Purification.description: Like Scribe's Reflection, but the iota is read out of an entity instead of my other hand.

Routing Distillation.name: networkindex
Routing Distillation.description: Accepts a linkable to use for network access, and any iota. If a relay connected to the network has an adjacent Network Routing Index with the same iota, returns that relay's position. Costs half an amethyst dust.

Prospector's Gambit.name: over
Prospector's Gambit.description: Copy the second-to-last iota of the stack to the top. [0, 1] becomes [0, 1, 0].

Summon Block Display.name: summonblockdisplay
Summon Block Display.description:
Summons a Block Display entity at the given position, displaying the given block. (The string must be the internal name i.e "minecraft:dirt", not "Dirt").
Costs about a Charged Amethyst

Charge Reflection.name: moving_up
Charge Reflection.description: Pushes how many twentieths of a second I've been intending to , or -1 if I am not.

Zone Distillation: BIT.name: zone_entity/bit
Zone Distillation: BIT.description: Take a position and a maximum distance on the stack, and combine them into a list of BIT's near the position.

Decorator's Gambit.name: setframerotation
Decorator's Gambit.description: Accepts an item frame entity and an integer from 0 to 7, and sets its rotation to the number. Costs a negligible amount of media.

Equality Distillation.name: equals
Equality Distillation.description: If the first argument equals the second (within a small tolerance), return True. Otherwise, return False.

Spacing Reflection.name: string/space
Spacing Reflection.description: Add a blank space string to the stack, useful for combining with other strings.

Evoker Reflection.name: is_evoking
Evoker Reflection.description: Pushes how long since a player has been evoking. Is -1 if they are not currently evoking.

Summon Cyclic Wisp.name: wisp/summon/ticking
Summon Cyclic Wisp.description: Similar to Summon Projectile Wisp, but with only one vector input for the position to summon the wisp. Cyclic wisps are unmoving once summoned, instead executing their hex up to 20 times each second.

Augur's Purification.name: bool_coerce
Augur's Purification.description: Convert an argument to a boolean. The number 0, Null, False, and the empty list become False; everything else becomes True.

Battery Purification.name: get_power
Battery Purification.description: Pushes the Redstone power that a position receives.

Separation Distillation.name: string/split
Separation Distillation.description: Removes the top two strings from the stack and splits the first string, using the second string as the delimiter and returning as a list.

Genie Reflection: Spatial.name: get_hand_lamp_position
Genie Reflection: Spatial.description: Pushes my original position when I began using the lamp.

Sprawling Distillation.name: matrix/concat/hori
Sprawling Distillation.description: Accepts an n by m matrix and an n by p matrix and produces an n by (m+p) matrix by putting the first matrix to the left of the second.

Muninn's Reflection.name: read/local
Muninn's Reflection.description: Copy the iota out of my ravenmind, which I likely just wrote with Huginn's Gambit.

Satiation Purification.name: get_saturation
Satiation Purification.description: Takes in an item identifier and pushes the saturation value, which roughly affects how long it will fill me.

Alteration Purification.name: can_prestidigitate
Alteration Purification.description: Pushes whether an entity or location is able to be manipulated with Prestidigitation.

Condition Purification.name: get_effect_category
Condition Purification.description: Pushes the general "goodness" of the effect towards the afflicted. -1 for harmful, 0 for neutral, and 1 for beneficial.

Huginn's Gambit.name: write/local
Huginn's Gambit.description: Removes the top iota from the stack, and saves it to my ravenmind, storing it there until I stop casting the Hex.

Division Distillation II.name: altdiv
Division Distillation II.description: Divides the first n by m matrix elementwise by another n by m matrix.
